properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 9:16AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the Black Warrior River At Holt
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Oliver
Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Levels are beginning to fall at Holt Lock and Dam and Oliver Lock
and Dam...but a Flood Warning remains in effect from Oliver Lock and
Dam downstream.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At  9:00 AM Friday the stage was 93.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 99.8 feet by
early Monday morning then begin falling.
* Impact...At 98 feet...Some cabins and trailers along the river
begin to flood. Widespread flooding of lowlands will occur.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by [  ] morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
